content.text:
# Discovery Science (Asian TV channel)

}}
| owner = Warner Bros. Discovery Asia-Pacific
| sister_channels =
| launch_date = 1998 (Discovery Sci-Trek) 2003 (Discovery Science)1 October 2021 (Indonesia)
| closed_date = 1 March 2021 (SD feed, Malaysia)1 October 2021 (HD feed, Malaysia)
| replaced_by = BBC Earth (Astro, Malaysia)
| former_names = Discovery Sci-Trek (1998-2003)
}}
Discovery Science is a Southeast Asian pay television channel (excluding Malaysia, formerly including Malaysia) owned by Warner Bros. Discovery Asia-Pacific. The channel replaced Discovery Sci-Trek.
On September 15, 2021, Astro moved the channel number of Discovery Science from 554 to 557. On October 1, 2021, Discovery Science ceased to broadcast on Astro due to a decision made following a review of the channel's performance. It was later replaced by BBC Earth.
On October 1, 2021, Discovery Science was launched in Indonesia via the cable provider TransVision.
A separate feed is run for India and other South Asian countries with timeshifted schedule.

* Alien Storms

SOURCES
Current feeds
Hong Kong
Available on Now TV Channel 211.
Taiwan
Available on CHT MOD Channel 254, as well as on selected locations of cable TV providers.
Singapore
Only available on Singtel TV Channel 205.
Formerly available on StarHub TV.
Philippines
Available on G Sat Channel 24 and Asian Cable Communications Inc (ACCION PH).
The channel was also available on Sky Cable and  until January 1, 2017. Ever since, numerous Discovery Science programs have continued to air via Discovery Channel.
Indonesia
Available on TransVision.
However, several Discovery Science programs have been continuing to air on Discovery Channel.
Defunct feeds
Malaysia
This channel was only available on Astro via channel 554. On September 15, 2021, it was moved from channel 554 to 557.  its Malaysian feed closed on October 1, 2021 due to bad reviews of the channel's performance. It was later replaced by BBC Earth (launched on the said cable TV provider on September 15, 2021) on channel 554.
Thailand
Afterwards, Discovery Science programs have continued airing on Discovery Channel.
See also
* Science Channel
* Discovery Science (Indian TV channel)
* Discovery Science (European TV channel)
